data.description:
Embark on a fantastical journey through the vibrant ecosystems of the Amazon and Tongass with Unearthed. Prepare to be whisked away on a funny, narrative-driven adventure. 

Unearthed is an impactful experience grounded in scientific research which has been modelled on the food chain within two distinct biomes. This virtual world reflects the real and incredible world of plants, animals, and ecosystems; empowering you to learn through play. 

Guiding you through this immersive journey are two quirky robot companions, Hazzi and Penni, voiced by Richard Ayoade and Sian Clifford. Together, they'll assist you in unravelling the wonders of nature as you strive to rescue the esteemed Professor, portrayed by Indira Varma, and ultimately, save the world!

Features include:

‚õ∞Ô∏è 2 unique biomes: Amazon and Tongass, crafted with scientific precision, and your cutting-edge Laboratory

üê† 6 captivating levels exploring a different part of the food chain

üêæ Unlock 2 playable animals with super power mechanics to aid in your quest

üîç Discover and learn about 80+ real plants and animals, each with unique characteristics and behaviours

üçÑ Immerse yourself in engaging stories and dialogue that seamlessly blend entertainment with education

üå≥ Stylised plants, trees, and animals modelled on those found in the real world

Set out on a journey where entertainment meets education, and adventure meets authenticity. Are you ready to unleash the explorer within and embark on an unforgettable quest?

changelog.change_log:
Version 1.1 changes:
- Enabled a compass on the Scanner tool when exploring the hub areas that can be used to help guide you to the nearest scannable object. 
- The teleport movement grid displayed on the ground has been refined across all areas and visually updated.
- Various tweaks and bug fixes, including some improvements to performance.
